attributes.action: Prevent teachers declaring their sexuality to school children
attributes.additional_details: Please see BBC.co.uk for further information with reference to the above
attributes.background: It appears that school governors are to actively encourage teachers to discuss their sexuality with the children in their care. I maintain this is unacceptable and does not help in their education at all.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
